:::{#about}

Matteo Larcher received a master's degree in mechatronics engineering at the University of Trento, where he is currently working on vehicle dynamic models for real-time applications as part of his PhD research program. His research interests are multi-body modeling of mechanical systems and hardware-in-the-loop simulations.
